text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood where concept is-a CRT

name: ActMoodCriterion
title: ActMoodCriterion
description: A criterion or condition over actual and potential services that must apply for an associated service to be considered. Matches records any ActMoodCompletionTrack moods.
